name: toboggan
content:

an object for sitting on and sliding over snow and ice that consists of a low frame which curves up at the front: They gently transported her down the mountain in a toboggan. I felt like a man on a toboggan sliding down an icy slope.
mikespics/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
